name: kurrajong
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several Australian trees or bushes with yellowish or red bell-shaped flowers : Kurrajongs retain moisture throughout summer.kurrajong tree She sat in the shade of a large kurrajong tree.
More examplesFewer examplesThe house was barely visible from the road, blotted out by the leaves of ironwoods and kurrajongs.In times of drought, the roots of the kurrajong tree hold water longer than other trees.To mark the birth of their first son, his parents planted a kurrajong tree in the garden.
